experience.title: Enedis
experience.description: As part of the Smart Grid & Electric Mobility team, I developed tools to facilitate interventions on the Enedis network. My missions included developing web applications for data management, optimizing intervention processes, and creating intuitive user interfaces. I also worked closely with the field teams to understand their needs and propose appropriate solutions, while respecting the network's safety and performance constraints.

experience.title: Epitech
experience.description: As a student at Epitech, I have the opportunity to follow a course of excellence in the field of computer science. The school enables me to develop solid skills in programming and software development.

experience.title: Epitech
experience.description: As a teaching assistant at Epitech Marseille, I support students in their academic careers by monitoring their progress and leading various teaching activities. My responsibilities include supervising projects, managing training workshops and taking an active part in school life. I also liaise between students and teaching staff to ensure the smooth running of educational programs.
